pr_title: Added ability to check if share, file or directory exists

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't need to try catch here given the overload being called already does this.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: For readability mind putting the entire second conditional on the next line?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Same comment about second conditional readability.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return true if the share exists, false if it doesn't
          
          
            
                 * @return Flag indicating existence of the share.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
This would differ from the other Javadocs but I feel it reads better.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Gets if the share this client represents exists in the cloud.
          
          
            
                 * Determines if the share this client represents exists in the cloud.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Does this method return HttpResponseException in some cases? Just noticed this check differs from the others.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: I think our serialization of exceptions happens depending on the XML returned by the service. The file getProperties request is a HEAD request so it doesnt actually return a body and we fail to serialize it - that's why the HttpResponseException is returned.
replies.author: gapra-msft

replies.bodyText: Gotcha, that is an interesting thing to know, wonder if this is a gap of functionality in the de-serialization logic that we should close the gap on. If you have a quick repo on hand mind filing an issue on this.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: made changes based off review comments

timeline.author: rickle-msft

timeline.message: Added more checks for error code
